DOC.brief_title: Study Safety Efficacy Doxercalciferol Patients With Chronic Kidney Disease , Stage 3 4 , Secondary Hyperparathyroidism
DOC.criteria: Plasma iPTH value 110 pg/mL CKD Stage 3 subject 150 pg/mL CKD Stage 4 Serum 25hydroxyvitamin D level great equal 30 ng/mL CKD Stage 3 evidence glomerular filtration rate ( GFR ) abbreviate MDRD equation 3059 mL/min CKD Stage 4 evidence glomerular filtration rate ( GFR ) abbreviate MDRD equation 1529 mL/min Serum cCa > 9.5 mg/dL Serum P > 4.6 mg/dL Abnormal liver function Anticipated requirement maintenance hemodialysis Use active vitamin D sterol therapy
